title: Beautiful, Newly renovated 3 bdr apt in New Edinburgh for May
description:
Welcome to this beautiful, newly renovated 3 bedroom apartment.


Perfect for cooking and entertaining! Newly renovated kitchen with new cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops. Spacious open concept kitchen, dining, living layout.


On a quiet street in the heart of New Edinburgh. The neighborhood itself ranks among the best in Ottawa. Enjoy the surroundings, the heritage buildings, the view of the river and the many parks and paths (walking, running, cycling).


Only a few minutes away by foot from the many shops and caf√©s of Beechwood village. Grocery store (metro) and pharmacy nearby as well.


Ottawa U is approximately 30min by foot or 15min by bus from the building. The By-Ward market is approx 35 min on foot.

location.mapAddress: , Oshawa L1L0M7 ON, Canada

title: University, College & Young Professional Accommodation In Ottawa
description:
For students living in the National Capital Region, Saint Paul University Residence is the place to be. No other accommodations in the area offer the opportunity to meet and interact with students from three different institutions of higher learning. Here you will find students from Saint Paul University, the University of Ottawa as well as Carleton University. Want to live close to downtown as well as your classes? Then, Saint Paul University Residence is the place for you.


Suite Features


-Oversized double bed (54" by 80")

-Kitchenette with sink, microwave and refrigerator

-Private three-piece bathroom within each suite

-Large desk and work area

-High-speed Internet access (following Saint Paul University usage policies)

-Private phone line with voice mail and local access

-Television with cable in each room

-Air-conditioned suites

-Light housekeeping service

-Barrier-free suite available for students with physical limitations


Security


-Controlled-access building

-Front desk staffed 24 hours a day

-On-site management

-All common rooms and hallways are video recorded

-Sign-in policy enforced for all guests


Advantages


-The Residence is a secure building with controlled-access entry and video-recorded common areas

-Accommodations come fully furnished

-Laundry, kitchen & BBQ facilities

-Regular social and educational activities organized by the Residence Life Staff

-Environmentally friendly smoke-free facility

-24-hour customer service counter

-Proximity to class means more study time and less travel time

-Pay only for your academic year and avoid a 12-month lease

-Eliminate hassles with deposits for utilities and phone or with roommates who do not pay their share

-With so many other residents in one location, it is easy to get together to form study groups and complete team assignments

-Study in your room or in any of the many Residence common lounges, or use the University resources located just steps away

title: Beautiful 3 bedroom unit in the Glebe!
description: Newer sixplex in an excellent location in the Glebe and walking distance to Carleton University. Perfect for young professionals or students looking for a high-end quality accommodations. South of Ottawa's downtown area, the Glebe is a remarkable neighbourhood in the city. It is home to Lansdowne Park, which contains the TD Place Stadium. The Glebe has one of the strongest community associations in Ottawa and hosts many fantastic events, it truly is a great area to call home!Features Include:- Designer kitchen cabinetry with granite countertops.- 5 stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and in-unit laundry.- Hardwood flooring and tiles throughout.- Central Air Conditioning.- Balconies on select units.- Responsive, proactive and respectful management.- Gas and water are included.The Neighbourhood Offers You:- 5 minute walk to Carleton University- Walking distance to Lansdowne Entertainement Area and Bank Street ShoppingAvailable May 1st, 2020Don't miss this wonderful opportunity to live right in the middle of this charming community!Contact 613-778-8118 or email rent@concorde-properties.ca to arrange a viewing!
